content: निश्चित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Ascertained, determined, decided, settled, concluded (used actively also); अरावणमरामं वा जगदद्योति निश्चितः <ls>R. 12. 83.</ls> {@--2@} Sentenced, pronounced (as a sentence). --तं Certainty, decision. --तं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Decidedly, positively, certainly.
